Implicit time-marching algorithms

The implicit time-marching algorithm is implemented in the implicit integrator class. Operations specific to a specific problem are delegated to the implicit equation strategy implementation provided by the user.
  • SAMRAI::algs::ImplicitIntegrator
  • SAMRAI::algs::ImplicitEquationStrategy
